description.en: Grab a wheel and position it at star line on your challenge field. Get your robot push it as far as it can.
Do not help with your bare hands, let your robot do the job. The farther the wheel run, the better.

You managed to push the wheel till the other edge of the field = Wow! Excellent job! Do you think you can do it even faster?
The wheel ran over the field = Outstanding! You are such a pro! Well done!
Bonus task: Can you do the same by programing your robot?

Let's count your points.
Reached the middle of the challenge field = 5 points
Ran over the middle of the field but stayed within it = 10 points
Ran off the field = 15 points
We would love to see your results, please share it thorough our forum page by clicking on the following link:
